sentences.en: ...the huge oil reservoir beneath the Kuwaiti desert.
sentences.cn: …科威特沙漠下面大量的石油储备。

sentences.en: A large quantity of water is stored in the reservoir.
All these earthquakes happened when the water level in Zipingpu reservoir was low.
sentences.cn: 所有这些地震都发生在紫坪铺水库水位很低的时候。

sentences.en: Enterprise must have a reservoir of cheap labour.
sentences.cn: 企业应储备廉价的劳动力.

sentences.en: He hikeed out to the reservoir.
How much water can this reservoir hold?
The masses have a vast reservoir of enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 群众中蕴藏了极大的积极性.

sentences.en: The reservoir has in storage about 30 million cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这座水库贮水约3000万立方米.

sentences.en: The reservoir will soon be completed.
The town is supplied with water from a reservoir.
sentences.cn: 该城镇由小山中的一座水库供水.

sentences.en: The villagers piped in drinking water from the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 村民用管道从水库引来饮用水。

sentences.en: The waste can be fatal if swallowed. Police are investigating what caused the reservoir to break.
sentences.cn: 如果吞咽这些废水可以致命。警方正在调查导致水库破堤的原因。

sentences.en: There the irrigation canal links up with the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 这条灌溉渠在那里与水库连接起来.

sentences.en: This reservoir extends a good five kilometres.
sentences.cn: 这个水库南北足有5公里.

sentences.en: This reservoir was formed by damming the River Blith.
sentences.cn: 这个水库是通过在布莱斯河上筑坝形成的。

sentences.en: Torrents of water gushed into the reservoir.
Various kinds of fish are being bred in the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 水库里放养了许多种鱼.

phrases.tran_cn: 碳酸盐岩储层；碳酸盐岩油储
碎屑岩储集层；碎屑油储
气藏；气田；煤气存储器；天然气储层
油贮；石油储集层；贮油柜
n. 储集岩；贮油岩；储油岩石

trans.tran_cn: 蓄水池，贮液器，储藏，蓄积
trans.tran_en: a lake, especially an artificial one, where water is stored before it is supplied to people’s houses
